direct_message_error: Sorry couldn't post your question or answer
clear_command_start: Beginning to remove all questions in the world café
clear_command_success: Successfully removed all questions in the world café
clear_command_fail: Sorry, something went wrong during the deletion of all questions in the world café

remove_command_fail: Sorry, the question with the id '{}' doesn't exist or something went wrong when trying to delete it.
